      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1627</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friendship.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freundschaft.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Amitié.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Friendship.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Amicizia.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φιλία.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Amistad.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">There are five computer -based activities in this lesson. It involves several technological tools using the Internet and the word processor .</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">computer -based activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friendship</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es gibt fünf Computer - gegründete Aktivitäten in 
dieser Lektion. Es bezieht einige technologische Hilfsmittel mit
dem Internet und dem Textverarbeitungsgerät mit ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Il y a cinq l'ordinateur - activités basées dans cette 
leçon. Elle implique plusieurs outils technologiques en 
utilisant l'Internet et l'unité de traitement de texte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Há cinco o computador - atividades baseadas nesta 
lição. Envolve diversas ferramentas technological usando o 
Internet e o processador de palavra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ci è cinque calcolatore - attività basate in questa 
lezione. Coinvolge parecchi strumenti tecnologici usando il 
Internet ed il programma di trattamento di testi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπάρχουν πέντε βασισμένες σε υπολογιστή 
δραστηριότητες σε αυτό το μάθημα. Περιλαμβάνει διάφορα 
τεχνολογικά εργαλεία χρησιμοποιώντας το Διαδίκτυο και τον 
επεξεργαστή λέξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hay cinco el ordenador - actividades basadas en esta 
lección. Implica varias herramientas tecnológicas usando el 
Internet y el procesador de textos.</string>
          </description>
